me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport.impl
Class PooledSMTPClientSession

java.lang.Object
  me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport.impl.PooledSMTPClientSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
SMTPClientSession
public final class PooledSMTPClientSession
extends Object
implements SMTPClientSession

SMTPClientSession which should be used in the context of a pool implementation

Author:
Norman Maurer

public Set<String> getSupportedExtensions()
Description copied from interface: SMTPClientSession
Return a "read-only" Set of all supported EXTENSIONS. This will be set in the EHLO Response so you will get an empty Set before the EHLO Response was processed

addCloseListener

public void addCloseListener(SMTPClientSession.CloseListener listener)
Description copied from interface: SMTPClientSession
Add an SMTPClientSession.CloseListener which will get notified once the SMTPClientSession was closed. This may be because the client or the server has closed it

send

public void send(SMTPPipeliningRequest request,
                 SMTPMultiResponseCallback callback)
Description copied from interface: SMTPClientSession
Send the given SMTPPipeliningRequest to the connected SMTP-Server. The given SMTPMultiResponseCallback will get executed for each response till SMTPMultiResponseCallback.isDone(SMTPClientSession) returns false

Specified by:
send in interface SMTPClientSession
